sentences.english: Please send your accounts for the period finishing with 31 March.
sentences.chinese: 请你寄出你截至三月底的账目。

sentences.english: The travelling accounts are handled by me.
sentences.chinese: 这次的外出旅游账目由我负责管理。

sentences.english: A petty account is used for recording small items of business expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 零用现金账目是用来记录小额的业务费用开支的。

sentences.english: There's an accounting error in this entry.
The accounts of the whole company are controlled in this department.
sentences.chinese: 整个公司的账目都是由这个部门检查。

sentences.english: After a long time, the master of those servants returned and settledaccounts with them.
sentences.chinese: 很久之后，主人返回家中，开始与仆人们结清账目。

sentences.english: Posts inventory to proper General Ledger accounts.
sentences.chinese: 被用来记入存货到正确的总账账目。

sentences.english: The company publishes its accounts in August.
sentences.chinese: 这家商行公布了八月份的账目。

sentences.english: Please settle this long outstanding account without further delay.
sentences.chinese: 请清偿这笔长期未清的账目，勿再拖延。

sentences.english: In spite of 2 reminders, the above account still remains unsettled.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我方曾两次催款，上述账目仍未结清。

sentences.english: The treasurer was arrested for trying to manipulate the company's accounts.
sentences.chinese: 这个会计因企图篡改公司账目而被捕。

sentences.english: Someone has tampered with the accounts of the company.
sentences.chinese: 有人篡改了公司的账目。

sentences.english: The accounts have to be audited by a firm of external auditors.
sentences.chinese: 这些账目必须由一家外聘审计员的公司来稽查。

sentences.english: We have tallied up the total of the account.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经算出了账目的总数。

sentences.english: The Written Notice will specify the basis for the setoff.
sentences.chinese: 书面通知要把账目抵消依据列入清单。

definition: to audit accounts/to inspect accounting books
to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]
to keep accounts/bookkeeping/to charge to an account
